title: How do we get there (investments)?
description:
You can explore here:
The means of implementation and support to achieve a well below 2°C warming target for different scenarios.

  • Which investments can shape a low carbon world?
  • Which divestments would need to take place?

This information can be investigated for
  • Different warming levels
  • With full or reduced availibility of carbon dioxide removal (CDR) technologies
